title: Nifty Bullish Reversal Trade
logic: Nifty is near support, and RSI indicates a bullish zone. Buying the 24500 call option offers a good risk-reward opportunity if the price bounces from this level. High OI at 24500 Put indicates a strong support

title: Nifty Neutral Iron Condor
logic: Market is showing a neutral bias. An Iron Condor strategy, selling OTM calls and puts, can profit from time decay and low volatility. High OI at 24500 and 24700 act as resistance

title: BankNifty Range Breakout Anticipation
logic: BankNifty is trading near a resistance level. Considering the possibility of a breakdown, buying the 53000 put allows to take an affordable position anticipating a potential downward breakout.
